title: Dark Mode Toggle
description: Add a dark mode option to reduce eye strain during late-night sessions. This would be especially helpful for users who work extended hours.

comments.author: Sarah Johnson
comments.content: This would be amazing! I work late hours and my eyes get really tired.

comments.author: Mike Chen
comments.content: Agree! Please also consider an auto-switch based on time of day.

title: Export Data to CSV
description: Allow users to export their feedback data and analytics to CSV format for further analysis and reporting.

comments.author: David Park
comments.content: Would love to see Excel format support as well!

title: Fix Search Bar Not Working on Mobile
description: The search functionality is broken on mobile devices. When typing in the search bar, it doesn't filter results properly.

comments.author: Emily Rodriguez
comments.content: Experiencing this on iPhone 13. Very frustrating!

comments.author: Tech Support
comments.content: We're actively working on this. Fix should be deployed next week.

title: Improve Loading Performance
description: The application takes too long to load, especially on slower internet connections. Consider implementing lazy loading and optimizing assets.

title: Add Email Notifications
description: Send email notifications when feedback status changes or when new comments are added to submitted feedback.

comments.author: Alex Thompson
comments.content: Yes please! I keep having to check manually for updates.

title: Better Error Messages
description: Current error messages are too technical. Make them more user-friendly and actionable.

comments.author: Lisa Wong
comments.content: The new error messages are so much better! Thank you!

title: Bulk Actions for Feedback Management
description: Allow administrators to select multiple feedback items and perform bulk actions like status updates or category changes.

title: Mobile App Crashes on iOS
description: The mobile version crashes consistently on iOS 17 when trying to submit new feedback. This is a critical issue affecting user experience.

comments.author: James Wilson
comments.content: Same issue here on iOS 17.2. Can't submit anything!

comments.author: Maria Garcia
comments.content: Workaround: Use desktop version for now. Mobile fix coming soon per dev team.

title: Smart Search with Auto-Suggestions
description: Enhance the search functionality to provide auto-suggestions as users type. Include recent searches and popular tags to help users find feedback faster. This would significantly improve the user experience when browsing through large amounts of feedback data.

comments.author: Kevin Lee
comments.content: Love this idea! Similar to Google's search suggestions.

title: Keyboard Shortcuts for Power Users
description: Add keyboard shortcuts for common actions like creating new feedback, navigating between items, and voting. This would make the application much more efficient for users who manage feedback regularly.

title: Save Filter and Sort Preferences
description: Allow users to save their preferred filter and sort settings so they don't have to reconfigure them every time they visit the feedback page.

comments.author: Rachel Brown
comments.content: This would save so much time! Always use the same filters.

title: Undo Last Action
description: Sometimes users accidentally delete or modify feedback. An undo feature with a short time window would prevent data loss and reduce support requests from users who made mistakes.

comments.author: Tom Anderson
comments.content: Accidentally deleted feedback yesterday. This would be a lifesaver!
